segment.source: Before you deploy Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 5.1 into a production environment, you should evaluate it in a lab environment.
segment.target: Before you deploy Microsoft Application Virtualization (App-V) 5.1 into a production environment, you should evaluate it in a lab environment.

segment.source: You can use the information in this topic to set up App-V 5.1 in a lab environment for evaluation purposes only.
segment.target: You can use the information in this topic to set up App-V 5.1 in a lab environment for evaluation purposes only.
